title: Under Apron
description: pounded indigo diamond shape apron; added batik bib with 2 ties; lower half has sections of geometric embroidery in white, red, green divided by 1/4\" applied red and green tape; three embroidered 3/4\" medallions with multicolored 1 1/4\" tassels at middle; 3/4\" loops on sides tied with black string
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
